typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> src01customer
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> src02person
src01customer select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID = Column_1,
		PersonID = Column_2,
		StoreID = Column_3,
		TerritoryID = Column_4,
		AccountNumber = Column_5,
		rowguid = Column_6,
		ModifiedDate = Column_7
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> slc01customer
slc01customer derive(CustomerID = toInteger(CustomerID),
		PersonID = toInteger(PersonID),
		StoreID = toInteger(StoreID),
		TerritoryID = toInteger(TerritoryID),
		AccountNumber = AccountNumber,
		rowguid = rowguid,
		ModifiedDate = ModifiedDate) ~> dev01customer
src02person select(mapColumn(
		BusinessEntityID = Column_1,
		PersonType = Column_2,
		NameStyle = Column_3,
		Title = Column_4,
		FirstName = Column_5,
		MiddleName = Column_6,
		LastName = Column_7,
		Suffix = Column_8,
		EmailPromotion = Column_9,
		rowguid = Column_10,
		ModifiedDate = Column_12
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> slc02person
slc02person derive(BusinessEntityID = toInteger(BusinessEntityID),
		PersonType = PersonType,
		NameStyle = NameStyle,
		Title = Title,
		FirstName = FirstName,
		MiddleName = MiddleName,
		LastName = LastName,
		Suffix = Suffix,
		EmailPromotion = toInteger(EmailPromotion),
		rowguid = rowguid,
		ModifiedDate = ModifiedDate,
		Z_PID_ModifiedDate = toInteger(replace(left(ModifiedDate, 7), '-',''))) ~> dev02person
dev01customer sink(input(
		CustomerID as integer,
		PersonID as integer,
		StoreID as integer,
		TerritoryID as integer,
		AccountNumber as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		PersonID,
		StoreID,
		TerritoryID,
		AccountNumber,
		rowguid,
		ModifiedDate
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 5,
		TerritoryID
	)) ~> sk01customer
dev02person sink(input(
		BusinessEntityID as integer,
		PersonType as string,
		NameStyle as string,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Suffix as string,
		EmailPromotion as integer,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as string,
		Z_PID_ModifiedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		Z_PID_ModifiedDate
	)) ~> sk02person
